itemListElement.name: MouldKing - Creative Idea - Plotter - 13181
itemListElement.description: Unleash your creativity and engineering skills with the Mould King 13188 Plotter! This innovative building set allows you to construct a functioning plotter that combines art and technology in an engaging way. Designed for builders of all ages, the Plotter features intricate mechanics and a unique drawing function, making it not only a delightful build but also an exciting demonstration of engineering principles. Features: - Functional Drawing Mechanism: Create intricate designs and patterns as the plotter moves and draws on paper, showcasing the beauty of automation and creativity in one model. - Interactive Building Experience: With various gears, motors, and components, this set provides a hands-on opportunity to learn about mechanics, motion, and the principles behind automated drawing. - High-Quality Parts: Constructed with durable, precision-molded bricks that ensure a smooth assembly process and reliable operation. - Creative Customization: Personalize your plotter by experimenting with different drawing materials and techniques, allowing for endless creative possibilities. - Educational and Fun: Perfect for budding engineers and artists alike, this set fosters a love for building and creativity while teaching valuable STEM concepts. What's Included: - Comprehensive instruction manual for straightforward assembly - High-quality building pieces for a seamless and enjoyable building experience - Various attachments and accessories for customization and enhanced functionality - Bring your ideas to life with the Mould King 13188 Plotter. Ideal for ages 10 and up, this set offers a unique blend of art and technology, making it a perfect addition to any collection. - Start your creative journey today and watch as your designs come to life! What's in the box 1 x MouldKing building set 3088 pieces 1 x MKH4.0 Battery Box 3 x HL Motor

itemListElement.name: 3D Handheld Drawing Printing Pen
itemListElement.description: Features: - Electric heating nozzle integrated and compact design convenient for maintenance and replacement. - It is lightweight in design and has easier speed control than other 3D pens that are on the market. -Super silence design. -Functional design. when the user forgets to turn off the power the product will automatically be converted to standby mode after 5 minutes. - Adjustment by digital display. PLA, ABS, HIPS, and other materials are all suitable to use. - It has a good plug design for the heater and nozzle to help control the temperature. - Has an intelligent standby function so it won't be a burden when not being used. - Create true masterpieces with this really effective 3D pen that will be suitable for artists, hobby enthusiasts, and creative individuals in today's society. Specifications: - Adapter:100-240V - Nozzle:0.7mm diameter -Scope: Painters, product designers, hobbyists, children, students, etc. What's in the box - 1 x 3D Handheld Drawing Printing Pen

itemListElement.name: 3DPEN-2-Pink
itemListElement.description: Draw your dream Create in 3D - The 3D printing pen extrudes heated plastic which instantly hardens, allowing you to literally draw in 3 Dimensions, freehand or on paper. Creates multi-layer artwork. Easy Handling - Pen style, lightweight design makes this the most comfortable and ergonomic 3D printing pen available. Easy Setup & Auto Shutdown - Fast boot setup in just 30 seconds gets you drawing and creating quickly. 2nd generation safety features, 3D pen will automatically shut down when not in use for over 5 minutes. ABS & PLA Filament - The Packgout 3D Printing Pen is compatible with both 1.75mm ABS & PLA Filament. We recommend using 1.75mm PLA filament, which is a more eco-friendly option. Specifications: - Adapter: 100-240V 12V2A (5V/2A) - Nozzle: 0.7mm diameter - Material: ABS/PLA - Plastic Feeding: 1.75mm What's in the box 1x 3DPEN-2-Pink

itemListElement.name: 3D Printing Pen With LCD Screen for Drawing - Blue
itemListElement.description: Suitable for 1.75mm ABS or PLA Filament,Best Gift for Children. Eco Friendly:FCC&UL passed,no any chemicals Like mercury and lead LCD Screen shows your control of temperature, speed, filament Button controls allows you to control extrusion speeds Unclogging mechanisms that prevent jamming Button controls that allow you to extrude or reverse filament In the Box : 3D Pen Powersupply User Leaflet Stand Sample filament PLA What's in the box 1 x 3D Handheld Drawing Printing Pen

itemListElement.name: Hand-held 3D Printing Pen - Draw Your Dream
itemListElement.description: The 3D Printing Pen is the newest concept in the field of three dimensional design, crafting and art. When you draw an object with the 3D printing pen, it emits heated plastic, which will be instantly cooled and solidified into a sturdy structure This 3D evolutionary gadget in the art of 3D creation will help you create whatever you can image Make a wonderful gift for creative children and adults You can use this pen to draw your desired letter, shape, figure etc. by using its ABS filament Suitable for painting worker, product designer, hobbyist, children, student, etc. Light-weight design can offer you more comfortable experience than the others Spinning speed is adjustable Intelligent standby function can really avoid unnecessary damage and save the electricity What's in the box 1 x Hand-held 3D Printing Pen - Draw Your Dream

itemListElement.name: Kids 3D printing pen with LED display. 3D doodler, Drawing printer pen
itemListElement.description: Product Description: - Comfortable, slim, and easy to hold and operate, - when not use for over 5 minutes, the 3d pen will switch to standby mode automatically. - LED display screen helps control temperature and speed. - Compatible with 1.75mm PLA (160-210?) or ABS (210-235?) filament. - Use safe, heat dissipation, filament is heated through pen body, and cools down, so no clogging, giving you smooth doodling. - It allows you to create quickly, and you can draw vertically or horizontally - It instantly hardens, allowing you to draw in 3D, freehand, or on paper. - Ideal for artists of all levels, designers, and kids from 6 years old. This amazing little tool allows kids to create 3D models, or they can just have fun doodling and drawing interesting things. Optional extras: 1. Pack of 10 colors, each 5m long, 1.75mm refills 2. Blue Silicone 3D Pen Design Drawing Mat with 2 Silicone Finger Protector Note: - Don't touch the nib during use. - Don't touch the nozzle before cooling. - Please unload the filament after use and turn off the power. - Little children should use it with adults' supervision." This amazing little tool allows kids to create 3D models, or they can just have fun doodling and drawing interesting things. Optional extras: 1. Pack of 10 colours, each 5m long, 1.75mm refills 2. Blue Silicone 3D Pen Design Drawing Mat with 2 Silicone Finger Protector Note: - Don't touch the nib during use. - Don't touch the nozzle before cooling. - Please unload the filament after use and turn off the power. - Little children should use it with adults supervision." What's in the box 3D pen Pen holder 3 PLA filament (3 colours) Power cable (USB) User Manual"

itemListElement.name: Handheld 3D Printing Drawing Pen
itemListElement.description: Features: - Electric heating nozzle integrated and compact design convenient for maintenance and replacement. - Your hand movements can create the art as the 3D pen follows your movement -And command as it can be used to draw in the air or on the surface as well as tracing objects on paper. -The slender pen body suits the hand's habit. - The step-less speed change by a single hand. -Intelligence standby modes. - Super silence design. Specifications: -Printing Area: Unlimited -Input: AC 100V-240V -Output: DC 12V 2A -Nozzle Diameter: 0.7mm -Diameter: 1.75 mm -Sprinkle Speed: Adjustable -Material: ABS/PLA What's in the box - 1 X Handheld 3D Printing Drawing Pen

itemListElement.name: 3D Printing Pen
itemListElement.description: Specification: Discharging mode: Hot melt extrusion molding Molding: Three-dimensional molding Print range: Unlimited Output: DC 5V 2A (Can Be Charged By Power bank) Temperature: Self-adjusting temperature Spiting speed:1-3 level adjustable Nozzle diameter:0.7MM Supplies diameter:1.75MM PLA/ABS Product material: Plastic shell Weight:230g What's in the box 1 x 3d pen 1 x USB charge cable 1 x pen base holder 1 x use manual 1 x 9M Filament

itemListElement.name: 20 Colours High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pens - Multicolour
itemListElement.description: Key Features: Vibrant 20-Color Assortment for Endless Creativity - This filament set includes 20 bright and diverse colors, allowing artists, students, and professionals to bring their ideas to life with stunning, multi-colored 3D creations. From classic tones to fluorescent shades and transparent options, there's a color for every design. High Dimensional Accuracy (+/- 0.02mm) for Precision Printing - Each filament strand is manufactured with tight tolerances, ensuring a consistent diameter of 1.75mm. This precision minimizes the risk of jamming and provides smooth extrusion, allowing for intricate details and clean layers in every project. Fast-Forming & Quick-Cooling Material for Efficient 3D Drawing - The PLA filament melts rapidly and cools down quickly, making it ideal for freehand 3D pen drawing and structured 3D printing. This feature enhances the ease of use for beginners while providing professionals with high-speed, efficient printing. Clog-Free Technology for Seamless Flow - The specially formulated PLA composition prevents clogging, ensuring a continuous and even flow through the pen nozzle. This results in a smoother and frustration-free creative experience, reducing interruptions and material wastage. Bubble-Free, High-Purity PLA for Professional-Grade Printing - Unlike low-quality filaments, this set is produced with a vacuum-sealed manufacturing process to eliminate bubbles and inconsistencies. The result is a flawless, durable print with minimal shrinkage and deformation. Non-Toxic & Eco-Friendly Material with No Harmful Fumes - Made from biodegradable, plant-based PLA (Polylactic Acid), this filament emits zero toxic fumes or odors, making it safe for children, home use, and enclosed environments. A great alternative to ABS filaments that release unpleasant fumes. Smooth Printing Performance for Crisp, Clean Designs - Engineered to glide effortlessly through 3D pens, this filament provides stable, smooth extrusion, allowing for crisp edges, vivid colors, and professional-quality results in both freehand and structured designs. Tangle-Free Coil Design for Hassle-Free Handling - Each filament color is neatly wound into organized, compact coils, ensuring easy handling, storage, and minimal tangling. The controlled arrangement helps users avoid filament knots, reducing time spent on untangling. Compatible with All Standard 1.75mm 3D Pens & Printers - Universally designed for compatibility with 99% of 3D pens and printers that use 1.75mm PLA filament. Whether you're using a beginner-friendly pen or a professional-grade 3D printing device, this filament set is a perfect fit. Long-Lasting & Extended Usage with 328ft of Filament - With 16.5 feet (5m) per color, this set provides a total of 328ft (100m) of PLA filament, offering an extended supply for multiple projects. Whether you're working on small sketches or large 3D models, this set provides plenty of material to unleash your creativity. This high-quality PLA filament refill set is ideal for artists, designers, students, hobbyists, and professionals looking for a smooth, durable, and reliable material to bring their 3D designs to life! What's in the box 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - White 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Black 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Red 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Green 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Purple 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Orange 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Brown 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Grey 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Cyan 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Light Pink 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Skin 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Light Orange 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Rose Red 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Light Green 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Light Yellow 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Light Blue 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Transparent Blue 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Transparent Green 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Transparent Yellow 1 x High Temperature 3D PLA Filament Refill Pen - Transparent Violet

itemListElement.name: 3D Handheld Drawing Printing Pen with 2x10m 1.75mm PLA Pen Filament
itemListElement.description: MATERIAL & SPECIFICATION: The LCD screen will display words "ABS", choose the right material model "material selection, temperature adjusting." from the LCD screen. The selection must be same as the material attribute consistent, in order to avoid failure Plug. BEST GIFT ITEM: Draw, Sketch and Build in 3D with this affordable high grade 3D pen. This 3D Pen is improving spatial thinking, creativity and artistic skills. When you gift this gift to your family and friends, they will like this product, because it is best gift for them. REDY TO USE PRODUCT: Normally plug in, and heat it up and enjoy the fun of creating a different different types of structure its only depends on your imagination. ADJUSTABLE TEMPRATURE: The Yellow LED lights on, the equipment is power on and enter to standby model. Temperature: 60 C - 230 C Adjustable Temperature and speed as well. EASY USE FOR BEGINNER: Plug the adapter into the back of the pen and choose your filament. The red light will turn on indicating warm up, it will take approximately 2 to 3 mints. itemListElement.name: Cricut Explore /Cricut Maker Infusible Ink Pen Set - 30 Pack Fineliner Pens
itemListElement.description: Watch your designs bloom into vibrant, permanent, pro-quality transfers on any compatible Infusible Ink blank when you create with these thirty colorful, fine point pens. Draw intricate designs freehand or use your Cricut smart cutting machine to draw or write your custom design on plain laser copy paper. Available in variety of colors and two different line weights, Infusible Ink Pens & Markers bloom into rich, vibrant hues once transferred using high temperatures. The results are bright, beautiful, seamlessly smooth transfers that never flake, peel, wrinkle, or crack! Do Take note to store your pens with tip pointing down Features: 30 fine point (0.4) Infusible Ink pens in Rose, Bubble Gum, Dusty Rose, Fuchsia, Coral, Red, Paprika, Orange Peel, Sunflower, Butterscotch, Yellow, Mint, Light Green, Apple Green, Sage, Green, Forest Green, Sky Blue, Something Blue, Azure Blue, Vivid Blue, Navy, Lilac, Light Purple, Eggplant, Violet, Gray, Dark Gray, Greige, Black Produces vibrant, pro-quality transfers that last a lifetime Requires compatible Infusible Ink blank (sold separately) and Cricut EasyPress or heat press that reaches 400 F (205 C) Transferred inks won't flake, peel, fade, crack, or wrinkle Draw intricate custom designs and text for T-shirts, coasters, baby bodysuits, tote bags, and more Carefully follow instructions at help.cricut.com/infusible-ink Water-based, acid-free, conforms to ASTM D-4236. Not intended for consumption or use on skin. For adult use only. For Cricut Maker and Cricut Explore family machines How it works: Draw design using Infusible Ink Pens or Markers on laser copy paper. Choose a compatible Infusible Ink blank (sold separately). Transfer design with Cricut EasyPress or heat press that reaches 400 F (205 C). What's in the box 30x Pack of Ink Pen

itemListElement.name: 100m 3D Printer Pen PLA Filament 10x10m Rolls 1.75mm Mixed Colours
itemListElement.description: This set of filaments offers a stunning array of colours, perfect for creating unique and eye-catching designs. Key Features: Mixed Colors: Enjoy a diverse palette of colours in each roll, providing endless creative possibilities. High-Quality PLA: Made from biodegradable and eco-friendly PLA material, ensuring smooth printing and minimal warping. Precise Dimensions: Each roll measures 10x10m, offering ample filament for extended projects. Compatible with 3D Printers and Pens: Suitable for both 3D printers and 3D pens, expanding your artistic horizons. Easy to Print: Our filament is designed for easy extrusion, resulting in clean, high-quality prints. Ideal for: 3D Printing: Create intricate models, figurines, and functional objects. 3D Pen Art: Draw and sculpt in three dimensions with precision and detail. Educational Projects: Inspire creativity and learning in schools and homes. What's in the box 10 x 10m Roll 1.75mm PLA 3D Printer Pen Filament

itemListElement.name: XPPen Deco01 V3 Graphics Drawing Tablet With Stylus
itemListElement.description: Please note that this XPPen Graphics Drawing Tablet requires connection to a laptop or desktop computer to function. It is not a standalone device. Enjoy a smoother and more natural drawing experience. The stylus has been upgraded to 16,384 levels of pressure sensitivity, supports up to 60 degrees of tilt brush effect and delivers smoother lines and strokes, as well as the ability to add shading to your creations for a more natural writing and drawing experience. Expand your world. The Deco 01 V3's expansive tablet is big and brilliant! It comes with a 10 x 6.25 inch working area so you have more space to create and get work done. But with only 8 mm thickness, you can take it anywhere without the burden of lugging around a heavy tablet! Versatility. The Deco features eight, round, customizable express keys that fit easily to your fingertips. With its blind spot reduction design, you can find the position of your express keys efficiently and the shortcut keys can be programmed to many different software programs. Ultra-thin. Ultra-portable. Only 8 mm thinness of the Deco 01 V3 tablet, more lightweight and portable. Slip it into the back of your backpack for a moment of inspiration. A free and articulate stylus pen. The stylus works just like a real pen, no battery and no charging required! The stylus is true-to-life with 16,384 levels of pressure sensitivity, giving it the intelligence to modify, navigate and create with a full pallet of brush and pens. New compatibility, new potential. The XPPen Deco 01 V3 supports connections with Android devices 10.0 and above. Recommend downloading: "XPPen tools" Android application. Adapts to the aspect ratio of your smartphone screen, ensuring accurate mapping. Supports mapping on Android screens with different aspect ratios in portrait mode. Engage, inspire, and immerse students and attendees like never before. Sketch, paint, design, and edit photos on your tablet. A unit powerful enough to help you take your ideas even further, annotating directly in files and sharing their screen in real time while streaming, broadcasting, or web conferencing. This flexibility allows the flow of creative ideas and the problem-solving process to be presented intuitively and efficiently. Extensive compatibility. Compatible with Windows 7 (or later), Android 10.0 (or later), macOS 10.12 (or later), Chrome OS 88 (or later) and Linux (Detailed versions). Also compatible with many major designer software such as Photoshop, SAI, Painter, Illustrator and Clip Studio, etc. Please update your Windows to version 11 or macOS to version 12 first. Specifications: Stylus: Battery-free Tilt: 60 Active Area: 10" x 6.25" Resolution: 5080 LPI (Lines Per Inch) Express Keys: 8 Customizable Express Keys Report Rate: 266RPS (max) Pressure Sensitivity: 16384 Levels Reading Height: 10 mm Interface Support: USB Compatibility: Windows 7 (or later), Linux (Detailed versions), macOS 10.12 (or later), Android 10.0 (or later), and Chrome OS 88 (or later). This Product now fully Supports macOS Monterey and Windows The drawing tablet may not work well with some foldable/detachable Chromebooks. The mapping result may vary depending on the PC vendor's setting. What's in the box 1 x Drawing Tablet 1 x Battery-free Stylus 1 x Stylus Stand 1 x USB Cable 8 x Replacement Nibs 1 x Protective Film 1 x USB to USB-C Adapter 1 x Drawing Glove 1 x Quick Guide
